Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: domo
Reviews.Content: I've been used pre-paid phone for few years because I'm tired of paying high monthly fees for just used my phone once a few days or less, I only wanted cell phone for on the road like emergency or convenience like travel. Because I'm not a talker on the phone, if I need to call, I usually call from home which I got a great package deal from local internet provider that included unlimited long distance call, internet and cable all in one price. But I'm a high tech lover, like all the electronic gadgets, even though I don't use phone much, I wanted a good phone, but all the cell phone company provide horrible pre-pay phones, since I'm using sims card on my phone, I was looking for a good phone that is unlocked so I may have a nice phone without signing the contract. After long searching, I decided to give this phone a try. I have to say this phone works good for me, not only I can using at home where I have wi-fi to surf the internet to download my favorite wallpapers, also I upload my own music from my home computer to set as my own ring tones, I can only say I'm VERY please with this phone. By the way, I also use to input Chinese language on the key board no problem, I strongly recommend this phone if you looking for a unlocked phone especially for ladies because it's so pretty in pink:)
